reviewText: stupid- but very funny.  i enjoyed it. would recommend it especially if you like "FOOLS and HORSES"

If you love clever..wittiy good ole English humor...this series is for you!!!

I own many British comedy series and this one rates at the top!!

Highly recommend this series!

A good carry on from the classic  ONLY FOOLS AND HORSES. Good new characters and plot with the same Boyce and Marline as you always loved before.
Theme tune could have been better, as a song writer I would have come up with something that had a bit more poke!
But all in all an enjoyable British classic.
